about_the_game:
The Universe is threatened by the mighty LORD CHAOSBRINGER, a primeval entity who has unleashed its chaotic hordes of elemental forces. The Universe needs YOU to defeat the forces of chaos and CLAIM THE TITLE of the MASTER BLASTER. Your journey will be difficult but fulfilling.

Blasting Action

  • AIM and SHOOT your blasters against attacking hordes of elemental particles.

  • Avoid, or take advantage of OBSTACLES and HAZARDS.

  • Deal with unexpected air hockey-inspired PHYSICS behaviors and make them work for you, or they will not!

Campaign Mode: Explore - Upgrade - Eliminate

  • 8 Galaxies to EXPLORE with 50 Levels of gameplay.

  • Power-up by completing levels and earning powerful REWARDS. By becoming stronger you will UNLOCK new Star Systems.

  • Make it to the FINAL battle against Lord Chaosbringer and save the universe!

Survival Mode: Aim for the High-Score and dominate the leaderboard

  • Survive INFINITE Waves of chaotic attacks for as long as you can.

  • Each Run is UNIQUE, so only your skills and smart selection of power-ups can keep you in the game.

  • Fallen CHAMPIONS will enter their NAME and SCORE in the Master Blaster’s STEAM LEADERBOARD (and earn bragging rights among their friends!)

Upgrade and Manage your Resources

  • UPGRADE your Energy Capacitors to make your attacks even more effective and spectacular!

  • UPGRADE your Resilience to improve your resistance to enemy attacks.

  • Utilize Special Shooting TACTICS to Regenerate your Energy and Resilience.

  • Earn meaningful REWARDS to reduce energy COSTS and enhance REGENERATION abilities.

Improve your Blastery!

  • Learn how to use COMBOS of Powerblasts, Collisions and Deflections to maximize the effect of your Shooting, while Regenerating your Energy and Resilience too!

  • Sharpen your reflexes in PRECISION challenges that will test your AIM and COORDINATION skills!

Tips and Tricks:

  • The game is optimized for CONTROLLERS. If your have one, use it!

  • Watch out for your ENERGY levels and prioritize to UPGRADE early on.

  • Charge-up your shots (POWERBLASTING) to maximize Energy REGENERATION and SCORE!

  • STRATEGIZE your shots to amplify their effect versus energy cost. For example, you can regenerate your Resilience, get a power-up and do multiple kills with a single shot!

  • Stay calm and ENJOY Master Blaster!

short_description: Grab your controller, charge your blasters and prepare for the physics shooter of the Universe! Take on diverse gameplay challenges, manage and upgrade your resources and abilities while you unfold the mysteries of the Cosmos. Defeat LORD CHAOSBRINGER and earn your title as the MASTER BLASTER!
